import React, {useContext, useEffect} from "react"; import mapaContext from "../../contex/mapa/mapaContex" const Registro = () => { const contextMapa = useContext(mapaContext); const {verificaLugar} = contextMapa; useEffect(() => { verificaLugar(true) }, []) return (
Registrar
); }; export default Registro;
